title: Qonto
description: Qonto utilizes a modern and professional color palette that is known for its striking and sophisticated combination. The vibrant purple (#6B5AED) serves as a primary brand identifier, supported by the strong, professional navy (#262A3E) as a secondary color. The clean, neutral white (#FAFAFC) offers a backdrop that maintains clarity and freshness, while the bright aqua (#63EBE4) adds a splash of energy and innovation. These colors, representing Qonto's brand identity, are prominently displayed across their official website and marketing materials.
